divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking to my car from the house. I stepped outside of house and looked up, I said OK where are you? A light appeared about 500?? ft above house maybe 1-5 miles away, it shot straight across the sky and then diappeared. I ran in and told my Mother and went back out to see if it was coming back. I thanked them and went on my way.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Santa Cruz
There were no other sightings in Santa Cruz on or around March 4th 2008
